name: Juruti
short_description: Juruti is a Firefox add-on that lets you use amazon's website to shop at your local book shop. Just fill your shopping cart (you don't need an amazon account to do that) and then, instead of checking out, hit the Juruti button. An e-mail listing all your selected products will be created that you can send to your local book shop.
summary: Use amazon's website to shop at your favourite local book shop.
